source.query:
/*custom field type mapping*/
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_types_mapping;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_types_mapping as
(
select a.rp_area_type, a.rp_descr, a.preparis_type, a.preparis_descr
from
(select t.* from
(values
row(5, 'user', '0741ab49-72f7-4555-b93c-b462cbd96007', 'User'),
row(19, 'function', '72bf9737-378a-4171-bfb1-deef31a7f9f9', 'Biusiness Continiuty'),
row(3, 'resource', 'ea473ce9-8796-4d7d-b74d-a154a56c1d5f', 'Biusiness Continiuty Technology')) t (rp_area_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)) a);

/*custom fields data types mapping*/
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping as
(
select a.rp_type, a.rp_descr, a.preparis_type, a.preparis_descr
from
(select t.* from
(values
row(10, 'DATE', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2', 'DateTime'),
row(2, 'ShortText', '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'ShortText'),
row(3, 'RADIO', 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875', 'SelectOne'),
row(0, 'PICKLIST', 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875', 'SelectOne'),
row(5, 'MULTISELECT', '76c83029-8439-42ad-90e6-7f0ff54b732c', 'SelectMany'),
row(1, 'CHECKBOX', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'TrueFalse'),
row(4, 'TEXTBOX', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', 'LongText'),
row(9, 'NUMERIC', '5f31785c-4d3c-4d68-a834-da37c2bc0a76', 'Numeric')) t (rp_type, rp_descr, preparis_type, preparis_descr)) a);


/* Process custom fields */
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields as
(
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cf.id) row_num,
cf.id,
cf.areaType,
cf.name,
cf.required isRequired,
cfdtm.preparis_type customFieldDataTypeId,
cftm.preparis_type customFieldTypeId,
cf.possition displaySequence,
uuid() newCustomFieldId
from t_custom_field cf
join migration_custom_fields_data_types_mapping cfdtm on cf.type = cfdtm.rp_type
join migration_custom_fields_types_mapping cftm on cf.areaType = cftm.rp_area_type);


/* process custom fields options */
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_options;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_options as
(
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cfch.id) row_num,
cfch.id,
cfch.field_id,
mcf.areaType,
cfch.name optionName,
cfch.possition displaySequence,
0 isDefault,
'b5da6970-6125-4904-b87f-c39187d4fd8a' customFieldOptionStatusTypeId /*Active*/,
mcf.newCustomFieldId,
uuid() newCustomFieldOptionId
 from migration_custom_fields mcf
join t_custom_field_choice cfch on mcf.id = cfch.field_id);


select count(*) cfCount from migration_custom_fields;

source.query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_strategy_custom_fields_values;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_strategy_custom_fields_values as
(
select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY user_id) row_num, t.*
    from
    (select
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c'/*ShortText*/ then convert(cv.text, char(4000)) else
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792'/*TrueFalse*/ then convert((cv.checked = 1), char(4000)) else
        case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a'/*LongText*/ then convert(cv.textArea, char(4000)) else
            case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2'/*DateTime*/ then convert(cv.date, char(4000)) 
                end end end end userValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where mcf.areaType = 19
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId in ('0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2')
union
-- add picklist values
    select 
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    convert(cfc.name, char(4000)) userValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join t_custom_field_choice cfc on cv.choice_id = cfc.id
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where user_id is not null
    and mcf.areaType = 19
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875' /*PICKLIST*/) t);

select count(*) customFieldsCount from migration_strategy_custom_fields_values;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_user_custom_fields_values;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_user_custom_fields_values as
(
select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY user_id) row_num, t.*
    from
    (select
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c'/*ShortText*/ then convert(cv.text, char(4000)) else
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792'/*TrueFalse*/ then convert((cv.checked = 1), char(4000)) else
        case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a'/*LongText*/ then convert(cv.textArea, char(4000)) else
            case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2'/*DateTime*/ then convert(cv.date, char(4000)) 
                end end end end fieldValue,
    ud.newUserId,

    from t_custom_value cv
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where mcf.areaType = 5

    select

    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,

    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join t_custom_field_choice cfc on cv.choice_id = cfc.id
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id

    where user_id is not null

if not exists 
(select 1 from bcPortalPlanTypes
 where portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}'
    and portalPlanTypeStatusTypeId = 'ab727771-44c6-4e3c-bcf7-6f7c37673aaa' /*Active*/
    and planTypeId = 'a5a1b20b-bbce-425e-b4ef-04e065cf3288' /*Disaster Recovery*/)
begin
insert into bcPortalPlanTypes
(
    portalPlanTypeId,
    portalId,
    planTypeId,
    portalPlanTypeStatusTypeId,
    dateTimeCreated,
    createdById
)
values
(
    NEWID(),
    '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}',
    'a5a1b20b-bbce-425e-b4ef-04e065cf3288', /*Disaster Recovery*/
    'ab727771-44c6-4e3c-bcf7-6f7c37673aaa', /*Active*/
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
)    
end

insert into bcPortalFunctionalArea
(portalFunctionalAreaId
, portalFunctionalAreaName
, portalId
, functionalAreaId
, dateTimeCreated
, createdById
, portalFunctionalAreaStatusTypeId
, siteId
, isHidden)
select newid()
, fa.functionalAreaName
, s.portalId
, fa.functionalAreaId
, GETUTCDATE()
, '7b5ea827-bcd7-4a8a-8807-fc7e94a93455'
, '5dced3d8-305d-4d12-8558-bc4fadbfe3de'
, s.siteId
, 1
from bcSite s
 join bcPortalIndustry pi on pi.portalId = s.portalId
 join bcFunctionalArea fa on fa.industryId = pi.industryId
where s.portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.PortalEntityID}'
 and s.siteStatusTypeId = '6d39ff0b-afac-45e8-bcb0-15673d70ce56' 
 and fa.functionalAreaStatusTypeId = 'aae1dff4-d206-4e72-ad0c-c64a30910d29'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select e.entityId
from azstudioEntityEntities e

source.query:
/*  USER PHONE NUMBERS  */
drop table if exists migration_all_userPhones;

create table migration_all_userPhones as (
    select 
        (select uuid()) as newPhoneId
        , mud.newUserId
        , mud.userId rpUserId
        , ci.id as rpPhoneId
        , ct.name  
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.numberString, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) phoneNumber
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.internationalCode, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) internationalCode
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.extension, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) extension
        , mcm.recoveryPlannerCountryName
        , mcm.CountryTypeName
        , case when mcm.CountryTypeId is NULL or mcm.CountryTypeId = '' then '2D76605B-86B5-40FF-9A71-C4893E5916FB' 
            else mcm.CountryTypeId
            end as CountryTypeId 
        , case 
            when cic.code  != 'US' then  '8337fbb1-9a43-45eb-aafa-19c877e762fc' 
            else 'ffabdff8-4b2c-4655-9edc-8195c303419d' 
            end as 'phoneNumberSubTypeId'
        /*
        Follow the Preparis Mapping else follow the following logic. 
        Phone data, map lowest internal ID data per distribution type that has data.
        rp.user.phone(Personal Distribution) = p.user.phone(Additional Personal Phone)
        rp.user.phone(Business Distribution) = p.user.phone(Office Phone)

	distributionType
		0 = business
		1 = personal

    emergency - emergency contact flag. we do not need emergency contacts

phoneNumberTypeId	                    phoneNumberTypeName
9da9c256-8283-4a0a-bd3d-10df73e1f43b	Security
391dca7b-aac3-4875-94e2-2ef680c7f35f	Additional Personal
20509910-5326-4057-b21f-5c694b314692	Office
5322a58a-8683-449b-a562-b0577de3fa74	Emergency
5eec12d5-595f-4123-a613-c63e701ae993	Personal
33f27328-8fee-4835-b020-cd6d48bb39cd	Mobile
 
        */
        , case 
            when ct.mappedName = 'preparisOfficePhone' then '20509910-5326-4057-b21f-5c694b314692'
            when ct.mappedName = 'preparisPersonalPhone' then '5eec12d5-595f-4123-a613-c63e701ae993'
            when ct.mappedName = 'preparisMobilePhone' then '33f27328-8fee-4835-b020-cd6d48bb39cd'
            when ct.mappedName = 'preparisAdditionalMobilePhone' then '391dca7b-aac3-4875-94e2-2ef680c7f35f'
            when cm.name = 'Cell Phone' and ct.distributionType = 0 then '33f27328-8fee-4835-b020-cd6d48bb39cd'
            when cm.name = 'Cell Phone' and ct.distributionType = 1 then '5eec12d5-595f-4123-a613-c63e701ae993'
            when cm.name = 'PHONE' and ct.distributionType = 0 then '20509910-5326-4057-b21f-5c694b314692'
            when cm.name = 'PHONE' and ct.distributionType = 1 then '391dca7b-aac3-4875-94e2-2ef680c7f35f'
            end as 'phoneNumberTypeId'
        , ct.mappedName
        , ct.distributionType
    from migration_user_data mud
    LEFT JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON mud.userId = ci.owner_id
    JOIN T_CONTACT_TYPE ct ON ci.contact_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN T_CONTACT_METHOD cm on ct.contact_method_id = cm.id
    LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY cic on ci.country_id = cic.id
    LEFT JOIN migration_country_mapping mcm on mcm.recoveryPlannerCountryName = cic.name
    where cm.name in ('PHONE', 'Cell Phone') 
    and ci.emergency = 0
);

drop table if exists migration_configuredUserPhones;

create table migration_configuredUserPhones AS
(select * from
(select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY newUserId, phoneNumberTypeId order by rpPhoneId) row_num_internal
    , rpPhoneId
    , newPhoneId
    , newUserId
    , rpUserId
    , name
    , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(phoneNumber, ' ', ''), '(', ''), ')', ''), '-', '') phoneNumber
    , internationalCode
    , extension
    , recoveryPlannerCountryName
    , CountryTypeName
    , CountryTypeId
    , phoneNumberSubTypeId
    , phoneNumberTypeId
from migration_all_userPhones) t
where row_num_internal = 1);
	

/* 2/20/24...  When you do phone numbers for a user, create four types, regardless as to whether they have numbers for them (Mobile, Personal, Additional Personal, and Office). If there is not a number for that type, set the phonenumber to ''.*/
drop table if exists migration_UserPhones;

create table migration_UserPhones as (
        
    with userConfiguredPhoneNumbers as (
        select newUserId
        , rpUserId
        , phoneNumberTypeId
        , case
            when phoneNumberTypeId = '20509910-5326-4057-b21f-5c694b314692' then 'preparisOfficePhone'
            when phoneNumberTypeId = '5eec12d5-595f-4123-a613-c63e701ae993' then 'preparisPersonalPhone' 
            when phoneNumberTypeId = '33f27328-8fee-4835-b020-cd6d48bb39cd' then 'preparisMobilePhone'
            when phoneNumberTypeId = '391dca7b-aac3-4875-94e2-2ef680c7f35f' then 'preparisAdditionalMobilePhone'
            END as phonenumberTypeName
        , phoneNumber
        , phoneNumberSubTypeId
        , extension
        from migration_configuredUserPhones
    )
    , userOfficePhoneNumbers as (
        select * from userConfiguredPhoneNumbers where phonenumberTypeName = 'preparisOfficePhone'
    )
    , newUserOfficePhoneNumbers as (
        select mud.newUserId
        , mud.userId rpUserId
        , '20509910-5326-4057-b21f-5c694b314692' phoneNumberTypeId
        , 'preparisOfficePhone' phonenumberTypeName
        , '' phoneNumber
        , '8337fbb1-9a43-45eb-aafa-19c877e762fc' phoneNumberSubTypeId
        , '' extension
        from migration_user_data mud
        left join userOfficePhoneNumbers upn on mud.newUserId = upn.newUserId
        where upn.newuserid is NULL
    )
    , userPersonalPhoneNumbers as (
        select * from userConfiguredPhoneNumbers where phonenumberTypeName = 'preparisPersonalPhone'
    )
    , newUserPersonalPhoneNumbers as (
        select mud.newUserId
        , mud.userId rpUserId
        , '5eec12d5-595f-4123-a613-c63e701ae993' phoneNumberTypeId
        , 'preparisPersonalPhone' phonenumberTypeName
        , '' phoneNumber
        , '8337fbb1-9a43-45eb-aafa-19c877e762fc' phoneNumberSubTypeId
        , '' extension
        from migration_user_data mud
        left join userPersonalPhoneNumbers upn on mud.newUserId = upn.newUserId
        where upn.newuserid is NULL
    )
    , userMobilePhoneNumbers as (
        select * from userConfiguredPhoneNumbers where phonenumberTypeName = 'preparisMobilePhone'
    )
    , newUserMobilePhoneNumbers as (
        select mud.newUserId
        , mud.userId rpUserId
        , '33f27328-8fee-4835-b020-cd6d48bb39cd' phoneNumberTypeId
        , 'preparisMobilePhone' phonenumberTypeName
        , '' phoneNumber
        , '8337fbb1-9a43-45eb-aafa-19c877e762fc' phoneNumberSubTypeId
        , '' extension
        from migration_user_data mud
        left join userMobilePhoneNumbers upn on mud.newUserId = upn.newUserId
        where upn.newuserid is NULL
    )
    , userAdditionalMobilePhoneNumbers as (
        select * from userConfiguredPhoneNumbers where phonenumberTypeName = 'preparisAdditionalMobilePhone'
    )
    , newUserAdditionalMobilePhoneNumbers as (
        select mud.newUserId
        , mud.userId rpUserId
        , '391dca7b-aac3-4875-94e2-2ef680c7f35f' phoneNumberTypeId
        , 'preparisAdditionalMobilePhone' phonenumberTypeName
        , '' phoneNumber
        , '8337fbb1-9a43-45eb-aafa-19c877e762fc' phoneNumberSubTypeId
        , '' extension
        from migration_user_data mud
        left join userAdditionalMobilePhoneNumbers upn on mud.newUserId = upn.newUserId
        where upn.newuserid is NULL
    )
    , combined_phone_data as (
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from userOfficePhoneNumbers
        UNION
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from newUserOfficePhoneNumbers
        UNION
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from userPersonalPhoneNumbers
        UNION
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from newUserPersonalPhoneNumbers
        UNION
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from userMobilePhoneNumbers
        UNION
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from newUserMobilePhoneNumbers
        UNION
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from userAdditionalMobilePhoneNumbers
        UNION
        select *,  (SELECT uuid()) as newPhoneId from newUserAdditionalMobilePhoneNumbers
    )
    select 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY newPhoneId) row_num
    , cpd.*
    from combined_phone_data cpd
);

source.query:
DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS PlanChildJSON;

CREATE FUNCTION PlanChildJSON
(id INT, type VARCHAR(50), children JSON)
RETURNS JSON 
BEGIN
    DECLARE node JSON;
    SET node = (select JSON_OBJECT('node', JSON_OBJECT('id', id), 'type', UPPER(type), 'children', children, 'selected', 'true'));
    RETURN node;
END;

SET SESSION group_concat_max_len = 1000000;

drop table if exists migration_plan_child_hierarchy;

create table migration_plan_child_hierarchy as (
    with RECURSIVE child_hierarchy as (
        select 
        root.*
        from migration_plan_components,
        JSON_TABLE(plan_component , '$.children[*]' COLUMNS(
            id int PATH '$.id',
            type varchar(50) PATH '$.type',
            children json PATH '$.children',
            parent_id int PATH '$.parent.id')
        ) root
        where root.type != 'root_appendix'

        UNION

        select child.*
        from child_hierarchy ch 
        join JSON_TABLE(children , '$[*]' COLUMNS(
            id int PATH '$.id',
            type varchar(50) PATH '$.type',
            children json PATH '$.children',
            parent_id int PATH '$.parent.id')
        ) as child on child.parent_id = ch.id

    )

    select * from child_hierarchy
);


with recursive child_hierarchy_info as (

    select id, type, children, parent_id
    , 2 as level 
    , concat(cast(parent_id as char(1000)),'.', cast(id as char(1000))) as hierarchy_string 
    , json_length(children)
    , case when json_length(children) = 0 then PlanChildJSON(id, type, children) end as child
    from migration_plan_child_hierarchy
    where parent_id = (select plan_id from migration_plan_components)

    union all

    select pch.id, pch.type, pch.children, pch.parent_id 
    , rch.level + 1 as level
    , concat(hierarchy_string, '.', cast(pch.id as char(10)))  as hierarchy_string 
    , json_length(pch.children)
    , case when json_length(pch.children) = 0 then PlanChildJSON(pch.id, pch.type, pch.children) end as child
    from child_hierarchy_info rch
    join migration_plan_child_hierarchy pch on pch.parent_id = rch.id
)
, leaf_nodes as (
    select * from child_hierarchy_info where child is not null order by level, parent_id
)

, parent_nodes as (
    select * from child_hierarchy_info where child is null order by level, parent_id
)


, parent_node_with_child as (
    select p.id, p.parent_id, p.type, l.child
    from parent_nodes p
    left join leaf_nodes l on p.id = l.parent_id
)

, child_nodes_with_children as (
    select c.id child_id, PlanChildJSON(c.id, c.type, concat('[',group_concat(c.child), ']')) children 
    from parent_node_with_child p
    join parent_node_with_child c on p.id = c.parent_id
    where p.child is null
    group by c.id, c.type
)

, painful_nodes_with_children as(
    select distinct p.id, PlanChildJSON(p.id, p.type, concat('[', cnwc.children , ']')) children 
    from parent_node_with_child p
    join parent_node_with_child c on p.id = c.parent_id
    join child_nodes_with_children cnwc on cnwc.child_id = c.id
)
, parent_nodes_with_children as(
    select pnwc.id, PlanChildJSON(pnwc.id, pnwc.type, concat('[',group_concat(pnwc.child), ']')) children 
    from parent_node_with_child pnwc
    left join child_nodes_with_children cnwc on pnwc.id = cnwc.child_id
    where pnwc.child is not null
    and cnwc.child_id is null
    group by pnwc.id, pnwc.type
) 
, all_nodes_with_children as (
    select * from painful_nodes_with_children
    union
    select * from parent_nodes_with_children
)
, root_nodes_without_children as (
    select id, child 
    from leaf_nodes 
    where parent_id = (select plan_id from migration_plan_components)
)

 select child as payload from root_nodes_without_children
 union
 select children as payload from all_nodes_with_children

CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_data AS (
SELECT 
    (SELECT uuid()) as newUserId
    , (SELECT uuid()) as entityUserItemId_portal
    , (SELECT uuid()) as entityUserItemId_location
    , (SELECT uuid()) as userProfileId
    , u.id as userId
    , c.name as contactName
    , IFNULL(ci.email,c.name) as username
    , c.firstName
    , c.middleInitials
    , c.lastName
    , case u.role when 0 then 'SYSTEM' when 1 then 'PARTNER' when 2 THEN 'ADMIN' when 3 then 'MANAGER' when 4 then 'USER' when 5 then 'LISTED' end AS role
    , case u.status when 0 then 'ACTIVE' when 1 then 'INACTIVE' when 2 then 'LOCKED' when 3 then 'TERMINATED' end AS status
    , u.currentLoginAttempts
    , IFNULL(u.password,'') as password
    , u.passwordExpired
    , u.passwordLastUpdated
    , u.twoFactorAuth
    , u.twoFactorAuthSecret
    , u.creationdate
    , u.timezone
    , c.externalID
    
    , case 
        when u.timezone = 'UTC' then '8fa8449a-4be5-4b8c-9bcd-c7f378a9f438'
        when u.timezone = 'JST' then '8702ab86-8acc-468d-a735-f5ab8c8de4d5'
        when u.timezone in ('CST', 'America/Chicago') then '19a4144b-76bd-42fd-baa8-bb528a814884'
        when u.timezone in ('EST', 'America/New_York') then 'c16ab931-6dfa-40b0-ac2a-e404e725c8b9'
        else concat('TimeZone', u.timezone, ' Not Yet Mapped')
        END  as timeZoneId
        
    , ci.pin
    , u.title

    , case u.LANGUAGE when 0 then  'BROWSER_LOCALE'
        when 1 then 'ENGLISH'
        when 2 then 'PORTUGUESE_BRAZIL'
        when 3 then 'SPANISH_DOMINICAN_REP'
        when 4 then 'SPANISH_MEXICAN'
        when 5 then 'FRENCH'
        when 6 then 'RUSSIAN'
       end
       as Language_String

FROM T_CONTACT c
LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON c.id = u.id
left JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON c.id = ci.owner_id and ci.primaryEmail = 1
);

CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_site_data AS (
    select ud.newUserId, ud.contactName, ud.username, ud.userId, s.*
    from User_data ud
    JOIN T_USER_SITE us ON ud.userId = us.user_id
    JOIN T_SITE s on us.site_id = s.id
);

CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_site_json_data AS(
select newUserId
, JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT(
    'newEnitiyId_Location', (SELECT uuid())
    , 'siteName', usd.name
    , 'siteAddress', usd.address
    , 'siteAddress2', usd.address2
    , 'siteCity', usd.city
    , 'siteState', usd.state
    , 'siteZip', usd.zip
    , 'siteDescription', usd.description
    , 'siteGeneralEmail', usd.generalEmail
    , 'siteLatitude', usd.latitude
    , 'siteLongitude', usd.longitude
    , 'siteFax', usd.mainFax
    , 'sitePhoneNumber', usd.mainNumber
    , 'primarySite', usd.primarySite
    , 'siteRegion', usd.region
    , 'siteCountry', usd.country_id
    )) as user_site_json
from user_site_data usd
group by newUserId
);

select ud.*, jd.user_site_json
from user_data ud
join user_site_json_data jd on ud.newUserId = jd.newUserID

with recursive iteration_data as (
    select 1 iteration_start
    , case when max(row_num) > 5000 then 5000 else max(row_num) end as iteration_stop
    , 1 iteration 
    , max(row_num) max_row_num
    from @{pipeline().parameters.tableName}
    union all
    select id.iteration_start + 5000
    , case when id.max_row_num > id.iteration_start + (5000 * (id.iteration + 1)) then id.iteration_start -1 + (5000 * (id.iteration + 1)) else id.max_row_num end as iteration_stop
    , id.iteration + 1
    , id.max_row_num
    from iteration_data id
    inner join @{pipeline().parameters.tableName} ds on ds.row_num = id.iteration_start
    
)

select * from iteration_data where iteration_start <= max_row_num;

activities.name: Build Migration table for Process Strategies

source.query:
drop table if exists migration_portalProcess_strategy;

create table migration_portalProcess_strategy AS
(
with toDefault as
(
    select
    f.id function_id
    from T_FUNCTION f
    left join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on f.Id = mfe.function_id
    where mfe.FUNCTION_ID is null
),
fromMatrix as 
(
    select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION by m.department_id, mfe.function_id order by mfe.siteType, CASE when (l.newSiteId is not null) then 0 else 1 end, rto.seconds ) row_num_internal
    , m.id matrix_id
    , m.name matrixName
    , m.description
    , mfe.siteType
    , mfe.site_id
    , mfe.function_id
    , f.name functionName
    , m.department_id
    , m.lastUpdateDate matrixLastUpdateDate
    , mfe.lastUpdateDate funcEntryLastUpdateDate
    , mfe.rto_id
    , case when l.newSiteId is null then '9c004e84-4eb4-44f1-a008-cd33f5211014' /*Work From Anywhere*/ else '704acb8f-ed9b-4f11-ab37-0f0139895d5b' /*Temporary Workspace*/ end strategyTypeId
    , pp.portalProcessId
    , pfa.portalFunctionalAreaId
    , l.newSiteId locationId
    , rto.seconds
    from T_BIA_MATRIX m
    join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on m.id = mfe.matrix_id
    join t_function f on f.id = mfe.function_id
    join migration_portalfunctionalArea_data pfa on pfa.department_id = m.department_id
    join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = mfe.function_Id and pp.portalFunctionalAreaId = pfa.portalFunctionalAreaId
    left join migration_site_data l on l.id = mfe.site_id
    left join migration_rto_intervals rto on rto.id = mfe.rto_id
),
withDefaults as
(
    select
    1 row_num_internal
    , 0 matrix_id
    , 'Default' matrixName
    , 'Default' description
    , null siteType
    , null site_id
    , pp.function_id
    , pp.portalProcessName
    , null department_id
    , null matrixLastUpdateDate
    , null funcEntryLastUpdateDate
    , null rto_id
    , '9c004e84-4eb4-44f1-a008-cd33f5211014' /*Work From Anywhere*/ strategyTypeId
    , pp.portalProcessId
    , pp.portalFunctionalAreaId
    , null locationId
    , null seconds
    from toDefault d
    join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = d.function_id
)

select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by portalProcessId) row_num
, t.* from
(   select
    uuid() portalProcessStrategyId
    , fm.* from fromMatrix fm
    where row_num_internal = 1
    union
    select
    uuid() portalProcessStrategyId
    , wd.* from withDefaults wd) t
);

select count(*) rowsCount from migration_portalProcess_strategy;

dependsOn.activity: Build Migration table for Process Strategies

select

drop table if exists migration_Strategy_Employee;

create table migration_Strategy_Employee AS
(
    with temp as 
    (
        select distinct
ps.portalProcessStrategyId,
ps.matrixName,
ps.functionName,
mfe.function_id,
pp.portalProcessId,
pp.portalProcessName,
fd.department_id,
d.portalFunctionalAreaId,
d.portalFunctionalAreaName,
mue.user_id,
u.username,
u.newUserId userId
 from T_BIA_MATRIX_USER_ENTRY mue
join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on mue.function_entry_id = mfe.id
join T_FUNCTION_DEPARTMENT fd on fd.FUNCTION_ID = mfe.function_id
join migration_portalfunctionalArea_data d on d.department_id = fd.department_id
join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = mfe.function_id and pp.portalFunctionalAreaId = d.portalFunctionalAreaId
join migration_all_user_data u on u.userId = mue.user_id
join migration_portalProcess_strategy ps on ps.portalProcessId = pp.portalProcessId
where entry_type = 'FUNCTION'
    )

    select
    ROW_NUMBER() over (order by portalProcessId) row_num
    , uuid() portalProcessStrategyEmployeeId
    , temp.* from temp
);

source.query:
drop table if exists migration_Strategy_Technology;

create table migration_Strategy_Technology AS
(
with toDefault as
(
    select
    f.id function_id
    from T_FUNCTION f
    left join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on f.Id = mfe.function_id
    where mfe.FUNCTION_ID is null
),
fromMatrix as 
(
    select distinct
ps.portalProcessStrategyId,
ps.matrixName,
ps.functionName,
mfe.function_id,
pp.portalProcessId,
pp.portalProcessName,
fd.department_id,
d.portalFunctionalAreaId,
d.portalFunctionalAreaName,
mre.resource_id,
tech.name rp_resource_name,
tech.technologyId
 from T_BIA_MATRIX_RESOURCE_ENTRY mre
join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on mre.function_entry_id = mfe.id
join T_FUNCTION_DEPARTMENT fd on fd.FUNCTION_ID = mfe.function_id
join migration_portalfunctionalArea_data d on d.department_id = fd.department_id
join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = mfe.function_id and pp.portalFunctionalAreaId = d.portalFunctionalAreaId
join migration_technology_data tech on tech.rp_technology_id = mre.resource_id
join migration_portalProcess_strategy ps on ps.portalProcessId = pp.portalProcessId
where entry_type = 'FUNCTION'
and resource_id is not null
),
withDefaults as
(
    select distinct
ps.portalProcessStrategyId,
ps.matrixName,
ps.functionName,
pp.function_id,
pp.portalProcessId,
pp.portalProcessName,
null department_id,
pp.portalFunctionalAreaId,
pp.portalFunctionalAreaName,
rf.resource_id,
tech.name rp_resource_name,
tech.technologyId
 from toDefault d
join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = d.function_id
join t_resource_function rf on rf.function_id = pp.function_id
join migration_technology_data tech on tech.rp_technology_id = rf.resource_id
join migration_portalProcess_strategy ps on ps.portalProcessId = pp.portalProcessId
)

select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by portalProcessId) row_num
, t.* from
(   select
    uuid() portalProcessStrategyTechnologyId,
    fm.* from fromMatrix fm
    union
    select
    uuid() portalProcessStrategyTechnologyId,
    wd.* from withDefaults wd) t
);

select count(*) rowsCount from migration_Strategy_Technology;

with toDefault as

    where mfe.FUNCTION_ID is null
),
fromMatrix as 
(
select distinct
ps.portalProcessStrategyId,
ps.matrixName,
ps.functionName,
mfe.function_id,
pp.portalProcessId,
pp.portalProcessName,
fd.department_id,

join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = mfe.function_id and pp.portalFunctionalAreaId = d.portalFunctionalAreaId
join migration_vendor_data v on v.vendorId = mve.vendor_id
join migration_portalProcess_strategy ps on ps.portalProcessId = pp.portalProcessId
where entry_type = 'FUNCTION'
),
withDefaults as
(
select distinct
ps.portalProcessStrategyId,
ps.matrixName,
ps.functionName,
pp.function_id,
pp.portalProcessId,

join migration_portalProcess_strategy ps on ps.portalProcessId = pp.portalProcessId
)

);

source.query:
drop table if exists migration_technology_type_data;

create table migration_technology_type_data as (
    select 
    id rp_technology_type_id,
    `name`,
    uuid() technologyTypeId
 from t_resource_type
);

drop table if exists migration_technology_data;

create table migration_technology_data as (
    with combined_tech_data as (
        SELECT
        id as rp_technology_id
        , uuid() as technologyId
        , r.name
        , rpo
        , rpoType 
        , case rpoType
            when 0 then 'Milliseconds'
            when 1 then 'Seconds'
            when 2 then 'Minutes'
            when 3 then 'Hours'
            when 4 then 'Days'
            when 5 then 'Weeks'
            end as rpoTypeName
        , case rpoType 
            when 0 then rpo/1000
            when 5 then 7 * rpo
            else rpo
            end as rpoTime
        , case rpoType
            when 0 then rpo/1000
            when 1 then rpo
            when 2 then rpo * 60
            when 3 then rpo * 3600
            when 4 then rpo * 3600 * 24
            when 5 then rpo * 3600 * 24 * 7
            end as rpoTimeInSeconds
        , case rpoType 
            when 0 then 'E5967FB9-16CE-4545-A5F5-2B78014C9016'
            when 1 then 'E5967FB9-16CE-4545-A5F5-2B78014C9016'
            when 2 then '368095B8-685E-4F99-A3C5-C44BBD30783C'
            when 3 then '41BB6FC1-DF74-42B5-8F41-E55E5A4570ED'
            when 4 then '0CAB3E34-0F19-4CC6-B580-CC8DC70AF2D5'
            when 5 then '0CAB3E34-0F19-4CC6-B580-CC8DC70AF2D5'
            end as preparisTimeDurationUnitId
        , case rpoType 
            when 0 then 'Second * 1000'
            when 1 then 'Second'
            when 2 then 'Minute'
            when 3 then 'Hour'
            when 4 then 'Day'
            when 5 then 'Day * 7'
            end as preparisTimeDurationConversion
        , tt.technologyTypeId
        , tt.rp_technology_type_id
        FROM t_resource r
        join migration_technology_type_data tt on r.type_id = tt.rp_technology_type_id
    )
    select 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY technologyId) row_num
    , ctd.*
    from combined_tech_data ctd
);

select count(*) res from migration_technology_data;

source.query:
/* vendor and address */
drop table if exists migration_vendor_data;

create table migration_vendor_data as (
    with distinct_vendor_contract_data as (
        select distinct v.id vendorId
        , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION by v.id ORDER BY cast(vc.expirationDate as datetime) desc) row_num
        , v.name as vendorName
        , 'D355632B-46AB-4376-9591-318F44A505C1' as vendorStatusTypeId
        , v.description as comments
        , case when vc.expirationDate is null then NULL
            else cast(vc.expirationDate as datetime) end as contractEndDate 
        , v.address
        , v.address2
        , v.city
        , v.state
        , v.zip
        , v.mainNumber as phone
        , v.url
        , v.country_id
        , c.name as rpCountryName
        , pc.CountryTypeName 
        , pc.CountryTypeId 
        , 1 as isPrimary
        from T_VENDOR v
        /*join t_vendor_contact vc on v.id = vc.vendor_id*/
        join t_country c on v.country_id = c.id
        left join migration_preparis_userCountry pc on pc.CountryTypeName = c.name
        left join t_contract vc on v.id = vc.vendor_id
        order by v.id
    )
    select *, (select uuid()) as newVendorId, (select uuid()) as newVendorAddressId, 1 as doMigrate
    from distinct_vendor_contract_data
    where row_num = 1
);


/*vendor contact */
drop table if exists migration_vendor_contact;

create table migration_vendor_contact as (

    with all_vendor_contacts as (
        select 
        c.id contactId
        , mvd.vendorId
        , mvd.newVendorId
        , (select uuid()) as newVendorContactId 
        , concat(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) as name 
        , (select min(cast(AES_DECRYPT(numberString, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255))) from t_contact_info where owner_id = c.id and  contact_info_type = 'PHONE') as phone
        , (select min(email) from t_contact_info where owner_id = c.id and  contact_info_type = 'EMAIL') as email
        from migration_vendor_data mvd
        join t_vendor_contact vc on mvd.vendorId = vc.vendor_id
        join t_contact c on vc.id = c.id
        order by c.name
    )
    , vendor_primary_contact as (
        select min(contactId) contactId, vendorId 
            from all_vendor_contacts
        group by vendorId
    )
    select avc.* 
    , case when vpc.contactId is null then 0
        else 1 
        end as isPrimary
    , 1 as doMigrate
    from all_vendor_contacts avc
    left join vendor_primary_contact vpc on avc.contactId = vpc.contactId

);

with distinctBC_ITDR_UsedVendors as
(select distinct vendor_id from
(/*vendors used for BC*/
select distinct
mfe.function_id,
fd.department_id,
mve.vendor_id
 from T_BIA_MATRIX_VENDOR_ENTRY mve
join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on mve.function_entry_id = mfe.id

where entry_type = 'FUNCTION'
UNION
select distinct
null function_id,
null department_id,

from t_vendor_function

null function_id,
null department_id,
vendor_id
from T_VENDOR_RESOURCE) t)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_doc_folders_and_files;
CREATE TABLE migration_doc_folders_and_files as
(
    select uuid() newItemId, t.* from
        (select id
        , SUBSTRING_INDEX(name, '/', -1) name
        , parent_Id
        , case when fileSortType = 30 then 'file' else case when fileSortType = 20 then 'document' else case when fileSortType = 10 then 'folder' else '??' end end end itemType
    from t_file_base
    where forEvent = 0) t
);

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_doc_folders;
CREATE TABLE migration_doc_folders as
(
    with RECURSIVE r_folders
    as 
    (
        select
        id
        , newItemId
        , parent_id
        , name
        , 0 as depth
        , CONVERT('RecoveryPlanner Files', NCHAR(65535)) as path
        from migration_doc_folders_and_files
        where parent_id is null
        and itemType = 'folder'
        union all
        select faf.id
        , faf.newItemId
        , faf.parent_id
        , faf.name
        , depth + 1 as depth
        , concat(f.path, '\\', faf.name) path
        from migration_doc_folders_and_files faf
        join r_folders f on faf.parent_id = f.id
        where faf.itemType = 'folder'
    )

    select f.*, faf.newItemId newParentItemId,
    ROW_NUMBER() over (order by depth) row_num
    from r_folders f
    left join migration_doc_folders_and_files faf on f.parent_id = faf.id
);

-- rename 'Root' foler to 'RecoveryPlanner Files'
update migration_doc_folders
 set name = 'RecoveryPlanner Files'
 where depth = 0;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_doc_files;
CREATE TABLE migration_doc_files as
(
    select faf1.*
     , faf2.newItemId newParentItemId
     , ROW_NUMBER() over (order by id) row_num
     from migration_doc_folders_and_files faf1
     join migration_doc_folders_and_files faf2 on faf1.parent_id = faf2.id
     where faf1.itemType = 'file'
);

select count(*) foldersCount from migration_doc_folders;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_doc_images_with_folders;
CREATE TABLE migration_doc_images_with_folders as
(

with
rootImageFolderId as
(
    select id from t_image_folder where parent_Id is null limit 1
),

image_folders AS
(
    select distinct id
    , uuid() newItemId
    , parent_id
    , SUBSTRING_INDEX(name, '/', -1) name
    , 'imageFolder' itemType
    from t_image_folder
),

images AS
(
select
 rpxi.id
 , uuid() newItemId 
 , IFNULL(rpxi.folder_id, rif.id) parent_Id
 , SUBSTRING_INDEX(fileName, '/', -1) name
 , 'image' itemType
 from t_rpx_image rpxi
 join rootImageFolderId rif on 1 = 1
 left join image_folders ifs on IFNULL(rpxi.folder_id, rif.id) = ifs.id
 )

select *
 from images
union 
select *
 from image_folders
);

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_doc_image_folders;
CREATE TABLE migration_doc_image_folders as
(
    with RECURSIVE r_folders
    as 
    (
        select
        id
        , newItemId
        , parent_id
        , name
        , 0 as depth
        from migration_doc_images_with_folders
        where parent_id is null
        and itemType = 'imageFolder'
        union all
        select iwf.id
        , iwf.newItemId
        , iwf.parent_id
        , iwf.name
        , depth + 1 as depth
        from migration_doc_images_with_folders iwf
        join r_folders f on iwf.parent_id = f.id
        where iwf.itemType = 'imageFolder'
    )

    select f.*, iwf.newItemId newParentItemId,
    ROW_NUMBER() over (order by depth) row_num
    from r_folders f
    left join migration_doc_images_with_folders iwf on f.parent_id = iwf.id and iwf.itemType = 'imageFolder'
);

/* remove root level folder */
delete from migration_doc_image_folders
where parent_id is null and depth = 0;
/* first level parent should be null now */
update migration_doc_image_folders
set newParentItemId = null 
where depth = 1;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_doc_images;
CREATE TABLE migration_doc_images as
(
    select iwf.*
    , dif.newItemId newParentItemId
    , ROW_NUMBER() over (order by id) row_num
    from migration_doc_images_with_folders iwf
    join migration_doc_image_folders dif on iwf.parent_id = dif.id
    where iwf.itemType = 'image'
);


select count(*) imagesCount from migration_doc_images;

source.query:
/*All technologies for ITDR*/
drop table if exists migration_itdr_technologies;
CREATE TABLE migration_itdr_technologies
as (
    select tech.*,
    td.technologyId,
    uuid() newPortalPlanTechnologyId,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY tech.rp_technology_id) row_num
    from
    (SELECT r.id rp_technology_id
        , r.name rp_technology_name
        , MAX(!ISNULL(vr.VENDOR_ID)) has_vendor
        , MAX(!ISNULL(fr.FILE_ID)) has_file
        , MAX(!ISNULL(pr.PLAN_ID)) has_plan
        , MAX(!ISNULL(tr.TASK_ID)) has_task
    FROM T_RESOURCE r
        LEFT JOIN T_VENDOR_RESOURCE vr ON r.id = vr.RESOURCE_ID
        LEFT JOIN T_FILE_RESOURCE fr ON r.id = fr.RESOURCE_ID
        LEFT JOIN T_RESOURCE_PLAN pr ON r.id = pr.RESOURCE_ID
        LEFT JOIN T_TASK_RESOURCE tr ON r.id = tr.RESOURCE_ID
    GROUP BY r.id, r.name
    HAVING has_vendor OR has_file OR has_plan OR has_task) tech
    join migration_technology_data td on td.rp_technology_id = tech.rp_technology_id
);

/*select * from migration_itdr_technologies;*/

/*Task sets*/
drop table if exists migration_itdr_task_sets;
create table migration_itdr_task_sets
as (
    select t.*,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY rp_technology_id) row_num,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY t.newPortalPlanTechnologyId ORDER BY t.newPortalPlanTechnologyId) sequence_number,
    uuid() newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetId
    from
    (SELECT DISTINCT
    r.rp_technology_id,
    r.rp_technology_name,
    r.newPortalPlanTechnologyId,
    tm.id team_id,
    tm.name team_name
    FROM migration_itdr_technologies r
        JOIN T_TASK_RESOURCE tr ON tr.RESOURCE_ID = r.rp_technology_id
        JOIN T_TASK t ON tr.TASK_ID = t.id
        JOIN T_TASK_HOLDER th ON th.task_id = t.id
        JOIN T_TEAM tm ON tm.id = th.team_id and tm.forEvent = 0) t
);

/*
select distinct team_id, team_name from migration_itdr_task_sets;
select count(*) from migration_itdr_task_sets;
select distinct * from migration_itdr_task_sets;
*/


/*Task Set members*/
drop table if exists migration_itdr_task_set_members;
create table migration_itdr_task_set_members
as (
    select mem.*,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY mem.newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetId) row_num,
    uuid() newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetMemberId
    from 
    (select 
    DISTINCT
    ts.newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetId,
    ts.team_id,
    ts.team_name,
    ud.userId,
    ud.firstName,
    ud.lastName,
    ud.newUserId
    from migration_itdr_task_sets ts
    JOIN T_INDIVIDUAL_ASSIGNMENT ia ON ia.team_id = ts.team_id
    JOIN T_INDIVIDUAL_ASSIGNMENT_MEMBER iam ON ia.id = iam.ASSIGNMENT_ID
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = iam.user_id
    order by newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetId) mem
);

/*select * from migration_itdr_task_set_members
order by newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetMemberId;*/


/*Task Sets Tasks*/
drop table if exists migration_itdr_task_set_tasks;
create table migration_itdr_task_set_tasks
as (
/*Build a task tree - it is a hierarchical data. Sorting will be done after data is migrated to SQL server using hierarchyId data type*/
with recursive task_tree (id, task_id, team_id, root_position_sort, parent_id, depth, tp) as
(select id, task_id, team_id, root_position + 1 root_position_sort, parent_id, 0, replace(cast((ifnull(root_position, -2) + 1) as char), '-1', '')
 from T_TASK_HOLDER
where parent_id is null
UNION ALL
select th.id, th.task_id, th.team_id, tt.root_position_sort, th.parent_id, tt.depth+1, concat(tt.tp, '.', replace(cast((ifnull(th.child_position, -2) + 1) as char), '-1', ''))
from T_TASK_HOLDER th
join task_tree tt on tt.id = th.parent_id
where th.parent_id is not null
),
filtered_tasks as (
    select tt.* from task_tree tt
    join T_TASK t ON t.id = tt.task_id
    where t.event_data_id is null
)

select 
uuid() newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskId,
ts.newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetId,
ts.team_id,
ts.team_name,
t.id task_id,
t.estimatedTime,
t.measure time_measure,
ft.tp,
ft.root_position_sort topLevelTaskPosition,
/*CONVERT in this case returns TEXT data type (max 65,535 bytes)*/
CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(t.description, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') using utf8) task_name,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts.newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetId) row_num
from
/*Select distinct task ids*/
(select distinct 
task_id
 from
    (
    /*select tasks directly associated to the teams*/
    select distinct
    tt.task_id
    from
    filtered_tasks tt
UNION
    /*select all tasks associated to the teams via RP task sets*/
    select distinct
    t.id task_id
    from
    migration_itdr_task_sets ts
    join t_team_task_set tts on tts.team_id = ts.team_id
    join t_task t on t.task_set_id = tts.task_set_id and t.event_data_id is null
    ) temp
) dt
join t_task t on t.id = dt.task_id
join filtered_tasks ft on ft.task_id = dt.task_id
JOIN migration_itdr_task_sets ts ON ft.team_id = ts.team_id
);
/*
select * from 
migration_itdr_task_set_tasks
order by newPortalPlanTechnologyTaskSetId, topLevelTaskPosition;
*/

select count(*) from migration_itdr_task_set_tasks;

with dupe_event_name as (
    select name, count(id) 
    from t_event 
    where deleted = 0
    group by name
    having count(id) > 1
)
, dupe_event_data as (
    select id
    , CONCAT(e.name,'_', cast(DATE(creationTime) as char)) as name 
    , creationTime
    , description
    from t_event e
    join dupe_event_name de on e.name = de.name
    where e.deleted = 0
)
, no_dupe_event_data as (
    select id
    , e.name
    , creationTime
    , description
    from t_event e
    left join dupe_event_name de on e.name = de.name
    where e.deleted = 0
    and de.name is null
)
, unique_event_data as(
    select * from dupe_event_data
    UNION
    select * from no_dupe_event_data
)

select id
, replace(name, '''','''''') name
, creationTime
, replace(description, '''','''''') description
from unique_event_data

DROP TABLE if exists migration_all_user_data;

CREATE TABLE migration_all_user_data AS (

    with user_role_status_data as (
        SELECT 
            u.id as userId
            , case 
                when u.role is NULL or u.role = 5 then 'LISTED'
                when u.role = 4 then 'USER' 
                when u.role = 3 then 'MANAGER'
                when u.role = 2 THEN 'ADMIN' 
                when u.role = 1 then 'PARTNER' 
                when u.role = 0 then 'SYSTEM' 
            end AS role
            , case u.status when 0 then 'ACTIVE' when 1 then 'INACTIVE' when 2 then 'LOCKED' when 3 then 'TERMINATED' end AS status
            , COALESCE(ci.email,c.name, CONCAT(c.firstName,'_',c.lastName,'_NoEmailOrContactName')) as username
            , IFNULL(u.password,'') as password
            , c.firstName
            , c.lastName
            , ci.pin
            , u.title
            , u.employeeID
        FROM T_CONTACT c
        LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON c.id = u.id
        left JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON c.id = ci.owner_id and ci.primaryEmail = 1
        /*new rule when you pull users from RecoveryPlanner. If their Role is System they need to be ignored and not migrated.  02_27_2024*/
        where u.role != 0
        and u.status != 3
    )
    , user_stateId_data as ( 
        select 
            * 
            , case 
                when status = 'INACTIVE' then 'ffb8849c-4dc6-4c66-9d00-f93ac2ef260b' /*INACTIVE*/
                when role = 'LISTED' or username = '' then 'c1ff019b-b3f6-411c-b04e-59294e9090fe'  /*ACTIVE*/
                else 'b5d6bc28-5e6d-4bd1-b028-f7e9a6c6b7a1' /*PENDING*/
            end as userStateId
        from user_role_status_data
    )

    select *
    , (SELECT uuid()) as newUserId 
    , (SELECT uuid()) as entityUserItemId
    from user_stateId_data
);

/*  DEDUPE USERNAME DATA */
drop table if exists migration_deduped_username_data;

create table migration_deduped_username_data as (
    with duplicated_userName_data as (
        select 
        count(newUserId) dupeCount
        , username
        from migration_all_user_data mud
        where mud.role != 'LISTED'
        group by username
        having count(newUserID) > 1
    )
    , keep_duplicated_userId as(
        select min(mud.userId) userId, mud.username
        from duplicated_userName_data dud
        join migration_all_user_data mud on dud.username = mud.username
        where mud.role != 'LISTED'
        group by mud.username
    )
    , keep_duplicated_user_data as(
        select mud.userId
        , role
        , 'PENDING' as status  /*  this is meaningless, the userStateId drives this data */
        , mud.username
        , mud.password
        , mud.firstName
        , mud.lastName
        , mud.pin
        , mud.title
        , userStateId
        , mud.newUserId
        , mud.EntityUserItemId
        , mud.employeeID
        from keep_duplicated_userId kud
        join migration_all_user_data mud on kud.userId = mud.userId
    )
    , overwrite_duplicated_user_data as (
        select mud.userId
        , 'LISTED' as role
        , 'ACTIVE' as status
        , case when mud.username like '_%@_%._%' then mud.username else '' end as username
        , mud.password
        , mud.firstName
        , mud.lastName
        , mud.pin
        , mud.title
        , 'c1ff019b-b3f6-411c-b04e-59294e9090fe' as userStateId  /*ACTIVE*/
        , mud.newUserId
        , mud.EntityUserItemId
        , mud.employeeID
        from duplicated_userName_data dud
        join migration_all_user_data mud on dud.username = mud.username
        left join keep_duplicated_userId kud on mud.userId = kud.userId
        where kud.userId is null 
        and mud.role != 'LISTED'
    )
    select * from keep_duplicated_user_data
    union
    select * from overwrite_duplicated_user_data
);


/* MIGRATION USER DATA */

drop table if exists migration_user_data;

create table migration_user_data as (
    with mud as (
        select aud.userId
            , aud.role
            , aud.status
            , case when aud.username like '_%@_%._%' then aud.username else '' end as username
            , aud.password
            , aud.firstName
            , aud.lastName
            , aud.pin
            , aud.title
            , aud.userStateId
            , aud.newUserId
            , aud.EntityUserItemId 
            , aud.employeeID
        from migration_all_user_data aud
        left join migration_deduped_username_data dud on aud.userid = dud.userId
        where dud.userid is null

        union 

        select * from migration_deduped_username_data
    )
    select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY userId) row_num
    , mud.*
    from mud
);

/*PROFILE*/
DROP TABLE if exists migration_user_profile;

CREATE TABLE migration_user_profile AS (
    with combined_user_profile as(
        select 
        (SELECT uuid()) as userProfileId
        , newUserId 
        , firstName
        , lastName
        , pin
        , title
        from migration_user_data ud
    )
    select 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY userProfileId) row_num
    , cup.*
    from combined_user_profile cup    
);

/* EMAILS */

/*
emailTypeId	                            emailTypeName
d440a213-3ab4-4fb9-b306-5f567141ac53	Billing   -> preparisBillingEmail
d2b1d156-bdf9-4223-9368-825a448025ad	Business  -> preparisBusinessEmail
acb4f38f-3642-472a-8de2-dcead28584a2	Personal  -> preparisPersonalEmail

    Email data, map lowest internal ID data per distribution type that has data. 
        rp.user.email(Business Distribution Email)= p.user.email(Email)
        rp.user.email(Personal Distribution Email) = p.user.email(Personal Email)

	distributionType
		0 = business
		1 = personal

select * from T_CONTACT_TYPE
*/

drop table if exists migration_all_userEmails;

create table migration_all_userEmails as (
    select 
        (select uuid()) as newEmailId
        , mud.newUserId
        , ci.id as rpEmailId
        , ct.name  
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.contactName, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) as contactName
        , ci.email
        , ci.emailToSms
        , ci.primaryEmail
        , ct.mappedName
        , ct.distributionType
        , case 
            when ct.distributionType = 0 then 'd2b1d156-bdf9-4223-9368-825a448025ad'
            when ct.distributionType = 1 then 'acb4f38f-3642-472a-8de2-dcead28584a2'
            end as 'emailAddressTypeId'

    from migration_user_data mud
    LEFT JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON mud.userId = ci.owner_id
    left join migration_deduped_username_data dud on mud.userID = dud.userId and dud.role = 'LISTED'
    JOIN T_CONTACT_TYPE ct ON ci.contact_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN T_CONTACT_METHOD cm on ct.contact_method_id = cm.id
    where cm.name = 'EMAIL'
);

drop table if exists migration_userEmails_initial;
create table migration_userEmails_initial as (
    select minEmailId
            ,newEmailId
            ,newUserId
            ,name
            ,contactName
            ,email
            ,emailToSms
            ,primaryEmail
            ,distributiontype
            ,emailAddressTypeId from
(select ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by newUserId, emailAddressTypeId order by rpEmailId) internalRowNum
            ,rpEmailId minEmailId
            ,newEmailId
            ,newUserId
            ,name
            ,contactName
            ,email
            ,emailToSms
            ,primaryEmail
            ,distributiontype
            ,emailAddressTypeId
        from migration_all_userEmails) em
where internalRowNum = 1
);

/*  If a user has a personal email, but no business email, create the business email data 
could not do inline insert with multiple CTE, kept getting error: check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'insert into
 so I create a physical table to do the insert instead
*/

drop table if exists migration_userEmails_additionalBusinessEmail;
create table migration_userEmails_additionalBusinessEmail as (
    with users_personal as (
        select distinct newUserId 
        from migration_userEmails_initial 
        where emailAddressTypeId = 'acb4f38f-3642-472a-8de2-dcead28584a2'
    )
    , users_business as (
        select distinct newUserId 
        from migration_userEmails_initial 
        where emailAddressTypeId = 'd2b1d156-bdf9-4223-9368-825a448025ad'
    )
    , target_users_to_create_business as (
        select up.* 
        from users_personal up
        left join users_business ub on up.newUserId = ub.newUserId
        where ub.newUserId is NULL
    )

    /* protect from dupes*/
    , distinct_target_users as (
        select min(mue.minEmailID) minEmailId, mue.newUserId 
        from target_users_to_create_business tu
        join migration_userEmails_initial mue on tu.newUserId = mue.newUserId
        group by newUserId
    )

    select mue.minEmailId
        , uuid() as newEmailId
        , mue.newUserId
        , mue.name
        , mue.contactName
        , mue.email
        , mue.emailToSms
        , 0 as primaryEmail 
        , 0 as distributionType
        , 'd2b1d156-bdf9-4223-9368-825a448025ad' as emailAddressTypeId
        from distinct_target_users dtu
        join migration_userEmails_initial mue on dtu.newUserId = mue.newUserId
);


drop table if exists migration_userEmails;
create table migration_userEmails as (

    with combined_email_data as (
        select * from migration_userEmails_initial
        UNION
        select * from migration_userEmails_additionalBusinessEmail
    )
    select 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY newEmailId) row_num
    , ced.*
    from combined_email_data ced  
);


/*ROLE BUNDLE*/
DROP TABLE if exists migration_user_roleBundle;

CREATE TABLE migration_user_roleBundle AS (
    select 
    row_num
    , newUserId 
    , role 
    from migration_user_data ud
);


DROP TABLE if exists migration_site_data;

CREATE TABLE migration_site_data AS (
    select 
    (SELECT uuid()) as newSiteId
    , (SELECT uuid()) as newAddressId
    , (SELECT uuid()) as newMainNumberId
    , (SELECT uuid()) as newFaxNumberId
    , s.id
    , s.legacyId
    , case when length(s.name) > 100 then substring(s.name,1,100) else s.name end as name    
    , s.accessLevel
    , s.address
    , s.address2
    , s.altSiteSeatsAvailable
    /*, s.alternateSite  bit columns in lwcotrust?! */
    /*, s.available*/
    , s.city
    , s.description
    , s.generalEmail
    , s.geoCodeDate
    , s.geoCodeStatus
    , cast((case when (replace(s.latitude, '-', '') REGEXP '^[0-9]+\\.?[0-9]*$') = 0 then '0.0' else s.latitude end) as float) latitude
    , cast((case when (replace(s.longitude, '-', '') REGEXP '^[0-9]+\\.?[0-9]*$') = 0 then '0.0' else s.longitude end) as float) longitude
    , s.mainFax
    , s.mainNumber
    /*, s.planRequired*/
    /*, s.primarySite*/
    /*, s.region*/
   /* , s.showWeather*/
    , s.siteID
    , s.state
    , s.zip
    , s.contactlist_id
    , s.country_id
    , s.currentSurvey_id
    , s.alert_id
    , c.name as siteCountryName
    , c.code as countryCode
    , c.phonePrefix as countryPhonePrefix
    , case c.code 
        when 'US' then 'B4F1E6F9-D824-4F8B-8B4D-071D176FD9F3' 
        else 'E07182E2-6B17-420B-A613-33BF652B7E44' 
        end as 'PhoneTypeSubType'
    from T_SITE s 
    LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY c on s.country_id = c.id
);

create table if not exists migration_country_mapping as (
    select rpc.name as recoveryPlannerCountryName, pc.CountryTypeName, pc.CountryTypeId 
    from  T_COUNTRY rpc
    join migration_preparis_userCountry pc on rpc.name = pc.CountryTypeName
        or rpc.name = case 
                        when pc.CountryTypeName = 'Macau' then 'Macao' 
                        when pc.CountryTypeName = 'United States Virgin Islands' then 'Virgin Islands, U.S.'  
                        when pc.CountryTypeName = 'Congo, The Republic of the' then 'Congo' 
                        when pc.CountryTypeName = 'Virgin Islands, British' then 'British Virgin Islands' 
                    end
);


/*  ADDRESSES */

drop table if exists migration_all_userAddresses;

create table migration_all_userAddresses as (
    select 
        (select uuid()) as newAddressId
        , mud.newUserId
        , mud.userId
        , ci.id as rpAddressId
        , ct.name  
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line1, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line1
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line2, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line2
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.city, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) city
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.state, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) state
        , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.zip, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) zip
        , mcm.recoveryPlannerCountryName
        , mcm.CountryTypeName
        , case when mcm.CountryTypeId is NULL or mcm.CountryTypeId = '' then '2D76605B-86B5-40FF-9A71-C4893E5916FB' 
            else mcm.CountryTypeId
            end as CountryTypeId
        , cast(replace(ci.latitude,',','') as float) as latitude
        , cast(replace(ci.longitude,',','') as float) as longitude
    from migration_user_data mud
    LEFT JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON mud.userId = ci.owner_id
    JOIN T_CONTACT_TYPE ct ON ci.contact_type_id = ct.id
    JOIN T_CONTACT_METHOD cm on ct.contact_method_id = cm.id
    JOIN T_COUNTRY cic on ci.country_id = cic.id
    LEFT JOIN migration_country_mapping mcm on mcm.recoveryPlannerCountryName = cic.name
    where cm.name = 'Address' 
);

drop table if exists migration_userAddresses;

create table migration_userAddresses as (
    with home_addresses as (
        select  min(rpAddressId) 'minHomeAddressId'
            ,ua.newAddressId
            ,ua.newUserId
            ,ua.name
            ,ua.line1
            ,ua.line2
            ,ua.city
            ,ua.state 
            ,ua.zip
            ,ua.recoveryPlannerCountryName
            ,ua.CountryTypeName
            ,ua.CountryTypeId
            ,ua.latitude
            ,ua.longitude
            ,'8BBE4178-8ADB-48AE-9035-6D683F855916' as 'userAddressTypeId'
        from migration_all_userAddresses ua
        where name = 'Home Address'
        group by     
            ua.newAddressId
            ,ua.newUserId
            ,ua.name
            ,ua.line1
            ,ua.line2
            ,ua.city
            ,ua.state 
            ,ua.zip
            ,ua.recoveryPlannerCountryName
            ,ua.CountryTypeName
            ,ua.CountryTypeId
            ,ua.latitude
            ,ua.longitude
    )
    , business_addresses as (
        select min(rpAddressId) 'minBusinessAddressId' 
            ,ua.newAddressId
            ,ua.newUserId
            ,ua.name
            ,ua.line1
            ,ua.line2
            ,ua.city
            ,ua.state 
            ,ua.zip
            ,ua.recoveryPlannerCountryName
            ,ua.CountryTypeName
            ,ua.CountryTypeId
            ,ua.latitude
            ,ua.longitude
            ,'8BBE4178-8ADB-48AE-9035-6D683F855916' as 'userAddressTypeId'
        from migration_all_userAddresses ua 
        /* A user in Preparis is only allowed a single address. By convention it is generally the home address. So, if they have to you can only map one of them. If they have a home address use that one. If the dont have a home address use the business address. But we cant map them both.*/
        left join home_addresses ha on ua.newUserId = ha.newUserId
        where ha.newUserId is null 
        and ua.name = 'Business Address'
        group by ua.newAddressId
            ,ua.newUserId
            ,ua.name
            ,ua.line1
            ,ua.line2
            ,ua.city
            ,ua.state 
            ,ua.zip
            ,ua.recoveryPlannerCountryName
            ,ua.CountryTypeName
            ,ua.CountryTypeId
            ,ua.latitude
            ,ua.longitude
    )
    , combined_addresses as (
        select * from home_addresses
        UNION
        select * from business_addresses
    )
    select 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY newAddressId) row_num
    , ca.*
    from combined_addresses ca
);

/*  USER LOCATION MAPPING => migration_user_primary_site_data */

drop table if exists migration_all_user_isPrimary_data ;

create table migration_all_user_isPrimary_data as (
    with migration_all_user_isPrimary_data as (
        select user_id, site_id, isPrimaryForUser, concat(cast(user_id as char),'_',cast(site_id as char)) as composite_key
        from T_USER_SITE
        order by user_id
    )
    select * from migration_all_user_isPrimary_data
);

/*
select * from migration_all_user_isPrimary_data
*/


drop table if exists migration_user_without_primary_site_data ;
create table migration_user_without_primary_site_data as (
    with userSiteCounts as (
        select distinct user_id
        , (select count(isPrimaryForUser) from migration_all_user_isPrimary_data where user_id = upd.user_id and isPrimaryForUser = 1) primaryCount
        , (select count(isPrimaryForUser) from migration_all_user_isPrimary_data where user_id = upd.user_id and isPrimaryForUser = 0) secondaryCount
        from migration_all_user_isPrimary_data upd
    )
    , users_without_primary as (
        select user_id from userSiteCounts where primaryCount = 0
    )
    select upd.user_id, min(upd.site_id) as min_site_id
    from migration_all_user_isPrimary_data upd
    join users_without_primary uwp on upd.user_id = uwp.user_id
    group by upd.user_id
);

drop table if exists migration_user_min_primary_site_data ;
create table migration_user_min_primary_site_data as (
    with  migration_user_min_primary_site_data as(
        select min(usd.site_id) site_id, usd.user_id
        from migration_all_user_isPrimary_data usd
        where usd.isPrimaryForUser = 1
        group by usd.user_id
    )
    select * from migration_user_min_primary_site_data
);

create table migration_combined_primary_site_data as (

drop table if exists migration_user_primary_site_data ;
create table migration_user_primary_site_data as (
    with migration_user_primary_site_data as (
        select 
        (SELECT uuid()) as newEntityUserItemId
        , sd.newSiteId
        , ud.newUserId
        , 1 as isPrimaryRelationship
        , IFNULL(smd.isManager,0) isManager
        from migration_combined_primary_site_data ups
        left join migration_site_manager_data smd on ups.user_id = smd.user_id and ups.site_id = smd.site_id
            join migration_user_data ud on ups.user_id = ud.userId 
            JOIN migration_site_data sd on ups.site_id = sd.id
    )
    select * from migration_user_primary_site_data
);

    with migration_not_user_primary_site_data as (
        select 
        (SELECT uuid()) as newEntityUserItemId
        , sd.newSiteId
        , ud.newUserId
        , 0 as isPrimaryRelationship
        , IFNULL(smd.isManager,0) isManager
        from migration_not_user_primary_site ups
        left join migration_site_manager_data smd on ups.user_id = smd.user_id and ups.site_id = smd.site_id
            join migration_user_data ud on ups.user_id = ud.userId 
            JOIN migration_site_data sd on ups.site_id = sd.id
    )
    select * from migration_not_user_primary_site_data
);

/*
When a user only has alternate sites, the one that has the lowest internal ID will be used as the primary location AND make sure that the selecte alertnate site is NOT added as an altern site.

when a user exists in migration_not_user_primary_site_data
AND 
does not exist in migration_user_site_data

THEN:
    - create new table of distinct userids to operate on
    - update isPrimaryRelationship in migration_not_user_primary_site_data to be 1
*/

drop table if exists migration_user_to_update_primary ;
create table migration_user_to_update_primary as (
    select nup.newuserid 
    from migration_not_user_primary_site_data nup
    left join migration_user_primary_site_data up on nup.newuserid = up.newuserid
    where up.newuserid is null
);

update migration_not_user_primary_site_data 
set isPrimaryRelationship  = 1
where newuserid in (select newuserid from migration_user_to_update_primary);


drop table if exists migration_user_site_data;

create table migration_user_site_data as (
    with combined_user_site_data as(
        select * from migration_user_primary_site_data
        UNION
        select * from migration_not_user_primary_site_data
    )
    select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY newEntityUserItemId) row_num
    , cusd.* 
    from combined_user_site_data cusd
);

;
*/

/*  DEPARTMENT */

drop table if exists migration_department;

create table migration_department as (
    select *
    , (SELECT uuid()) as newDepartmentId
    from t_department
    where dtype = 'DEPARTMENT'
);

drop table if exists migration_department_hierarchy;
/*
create table migration_department_hierarchy as
select d.id department_id, d.newDepartmentId, d.parent_id department_parent_id, d.name, d.description
, p.id as parent_id
, p.name as parent_name
, p.newDepartmentId as parent_newDepartmentId
from migration_department  d
join migration_department p on  p.id = d.parent_id
;
*/
drop table if exists migration_department_users;

create table migration_department_users as(
    with combined_department_users as(
        select 
        (SELECT uuid()) as newEntityUserItemId
        , ud.user_id
        , mud.newUserId
        , ud.department_id 
        , newDepartmentId
        from T_USER_DEPARTMENT ud
        join migration_user_data mud on mud.userid = ud.user_id
        join migration_department md on md.id = ud.department_id
    )
    select 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY newEntityUserItemId) row_num
    , cdu.*
    from combined_department_users cdu
);


/* GROUP*/
drop table if exists migration_groups;

create table migration_groups as (
    with notification_name_count as (
        select distinct nl.name, count(id) idCount
        from T_NOTIFICATION_LIST nl
        group by nl.name
    )
    , notification_name_no_dupe as (
        select nnc.name, nl.id, description
        from notification_name_count nnc
        join T_NOTIFICATION_LIST nl on nnc.name = nl.name
        where idCount = 1
    )
    , notification_name_dupe_min as (
        select min(nl.id) as id, nnc.name  
        from notification_name_count nnc
        join T_NOTIFICATION_LIST nl on nnc.name = nl.name
        where nnc.idCount > 1
        group by  nnc.name   
    )

    , notification_name_dupes as (
        select nnc.name, nl.id, concat(nnc.name,'_',cast(nl.id as char)) as dupeName, nl.description  
        from notification_name_count nnc
        join T_NOTIFICATION_LIST nl on nnc.name = nl.name
        left join notification_name_dupe_min ndm on nl.id = ndm.id
        where nnc.idCount > 1
        and ndm.id is null
    )
    , migration_group_names as(
        select (select uuid()) as newGroupId, name, id, description  from notification_name_no_dupe
        union
        select (select uuid()) as newGroupId, dn.name, dn.id, nl.description  from notification_name_dupe_min dn join T_NOTIFICATION_LIST nl on dn.id = nl.id
        union
        select (select uuid()) as newGroupId, dupeName, id, description  from notification_name_dupes
    )
    
    select distinct mgn.* 
    from migration_group_names mgn
    join t_notification_list_contact nlc on mgn.id = nlc.notification_list_id

);

drop table if exists migration_group_users;
create table migration_group_users as (
    with group_user_data as (
        select nlm.*, mud.newUserId, mud.userId, (select uuid()) as newEntityUserItemId
        from migration_groups nlm
        join t_notification_list_contact nlc on nlm.id = nlc.notification_list_id
        join migration_user_data mud on nlc.contact_id = mud.userId
    )
    select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY newEntityUserItemId) row_num
    , gud.* 
    from group_user_data gud
);


/*  FUNCTIONAL AREA  */

drop table if exists migration_bcPortalFunctionalArea_leaderUserId;

create table migration_bcPortalFunctionalArea_leaderUserId as (
    with admin_department_user as( 
        select min(mdu.user_id) as user_id, mdu.department_id
        from migration_department_users mdu
        join migration_user_data mud on mdu.user_id = mud.userid
        where mud.role = 'ADMIN'
        group by mdu.department_id
    )
    , not_admin_department_user as (
        select min(mdu.user_id) as user_id, mdu.department_id
        from migration_department_users mdu
        join migration_user_data mud on mdu.user_id = mud.userid
        left join admin_department_user adu on mdu.department_id = adu.department_id
        where adu.department_id is null
        group by  mdu.department_id
    )
    , lead_data as (
    select * from admin_department_user
    union 
    select * from not_admin_department_user
    )

    select mdu.user_id, mdu.newUserId as leaderUserId, mdu.department_id
    from migration_department_users mdu
    join lead_data ld on ld.user_id = mdu.user_id and ld.department_id = mdu.department_id
    order by mdu.department_id

);

drop table if exists migration_PortalFunctionalArea_data;

create table migration_PortalFunctionalArea_data as (
    with PortalFunctionalArea_data as (
        select distinct 
        md.name as portalFunctionalAreaName
        , md.description as portalFunctionalAreaDescription
        , lu.leaderUserId
        , fd.DEPARTMENT_ID
        , md.newDepartmentId
        from migration_department md
        join t_function_department fd on md.ID = fd.DEPARTMENT_ID
        join t_function f on fd.FUNCTION_ID = f.ID
        left join migration_bcPortalFunctionalArea_leaderUserId lu on fd.DEPARTMENT_ID = lu.department_id
    )
    select
        fad.* 
        , (Select uuid()) as portalFunctionalAreaId
        , (select uuid()) as bcPortalFunctionalAreaToDepartmentId
    from PortalFunctionalArea_data fad
);


drop table if exists migration_FunctionalArea_data;

create table migration_FunctionalArea_data as (
    select distinct 
    md.name as portalFunctionalAreaName
    , md.description as portalFunctionalAreaDescription
    , lu.leaderUserId
    , fd.DEPARTMENT_ID
    , md.newDepartmentId
    from migration_department md
    join t_function_department fd on md.ID = fd.DEPARTMENT_ID
    join t_function f on fd.FUNCTION_ID = f.ID
    left join migration_bcPortalFunctionalArea_leaderUserId lu on fd.DEPARTMENT_ID = lu.department_id
);

drop table if exists migration_PortalProcess_data;

create table migration_PortalProcess_data as (
    select distinct 
    (Select uuid()) as portalProcessId
    , f.name as portalProcessName
    , f.ID FUNCTION_ID
    , pfa.portalFunctionalAreaName
    , pfa.portalFunctionalAreaId
    , f.description as portalProcessDescription
    from migration_PortalFunctionalArea_data pfa
    join t_function_department fd on pfa.department_ID = fd.DEPARTMENT_ID
    join t_function f on fd.FUNCTION_ID = f.ID
);


/*  Map the Recovery Planner site types to Preparis location "location types" field.  MG-14*/

drop table if exists migration_site_type;

create table migration_site_type as (
    select ts.id, ts.primarySite, ts.alternateSite 
    , msd.newSiteId
    , case 
        when ts.primarySite = 1 and ts.alternateSite = 1 then '2a136e36-be6d-4d2c-bacf-ee0a3cd08479'
        when ts.primarySite = 1 then 'c97f4496-6d74-45eb-a742-bd6c77dad64f' 
        when ts.alternateSite = 1 then 'e7ecddd7-e040-4c92-8359-1861522561a1'
        end as azstudioSettings_value
    , (SELECT uuid()) as newSettingId 
    from T_SITE ts
    join migration_site_data msd on ts.id = msd.id
);




/* notification lists  MG-15 */
drop table if exists migration_notification_list_names;

/* distinct plans */
with plansWithoutDepartment as (
    select p.id as plan_id,
    replace(p.name, '''','''''') as plan_name,
    DATE(p.lastUpdateDate) as LastUpdateDate
    from t_plan p
    where forEvent = 0
)
, dupePlanNames as (
    select pwod.plan_name, count(pwod.plan_id)
    from plansWithoutDepartment pwod
    group by pwod.plan_name
    having count(pwod.plan_id) > 1
)
, dupePlanData as (
    select plan_id
    , CONCAT(pwod.plan_name, '_', cast(LastUpdateDate as char)) as plan_name
    , LastUpdateDate
    from plansWithoutDepartment pwod
    join dupePlanNames dpn on pwod.plan_name = dpn.plan_name 
)
, noDupePlanData as(
    select pwod.* 
    from plansWithoutDepartment pwod
    left join dupePlanData dpd on pwod.plan_id = dpd.plan_id
    where dpd.plan_id is null
)

select * from dupePlanData
union
select * from noDupePlanData

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_portalProcess_dependency;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_portalProcess_dependency
(
    row_num INT,
    dependentPortalProcessId CHAR(38),
    child_Id INT,
    portalProcessId CHAR(38),
    parent_id INT,
    portalProcessDependencyId char(38)
);

insert into migration_portalProcess_dependency
(row_num, dependentPortalProcessId, child_Id, portalProcessId, parent_id, portalProcessDependencyId)
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by child_Id) row_num,
ppdChild.portalProcessId dependentPortalProcessId
, fg.child_Id
, ppdParent.portalProcessId portalProcessId
, fg.parent_id
, uuid() portalProcessDependencyId
from t_function_graph fg
join migration_portalProcess_data ppdChild on ppdChild.function_id = fg.child_id
join migration_portalProcess_data ppdParent on ppdParent.function_id = fg.parent_id;

source.query:
-- Seconds In Day = 86400

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_rto_intervals;

CREATE TABLE migration_rto_intervals AS (

with temp as
(select 
id,
uuid() newImpactTimespanId,
substring(description, 1, 20) description,
(FRAME_END_HOURS * 3600) +
(FRAME_END_DAYS * 86400) +
(FRAME_END_WEEKS * 86400 * 7) +
(FRAME_END_MONTHS * 86400 * 30) seconds
 from t_recovery_time_objective)

select t.*,
case when unit = 'days' then seconds DIV (3600 * 24) else
    case when unit = 'hours' then seconds DIV 3600 else 100 end end timespanDuration,
case when unit = 'days' then '0cab3e34-0f19-4cc6-b580-cc8dc70af2d5' else
    case when unit = 'hours' then '41bb6fc1-df74-42b5-8f41-e55e5a4570ed' else '9372a9f2-4391-4a8b-80ec-9c6150a48f23' end end timespanDurationUnitId
 from
(select id, newImpactTimespanId, description, seconds,
IF ((seconds / 86400) != CONVERT(seconds / 86400, UNSIGNED), 'hours', 'days') unit
 from temp
 UNION
 select
 -1,
 uuid() newImpactTimespanId,
 substring((select CONCAT(temp.description, ' +')
 from temp
 where seconds = (select max(seconds) from temp)), 1, 20) description,
  3153600000 seconds,
  'years' unit) t
);

select 'DONE' as 'Lookup Activity Hack';

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_technology_custom_fields_values;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_technology_custom_fields_values as
(
select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY resource_id) row_num, t.*
    from
    (select
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.resource_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c'/*ShortText*/ then convert(cv.text, char(4000)) else
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792'/*TrueFalse*/ then convert((cv.checked = 1), char(4000)) else
        case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a'/*LongText*/ then convert(cv.textArea, char(4000)) else
            case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2'/*DateTime*/ then convert(cv.date, char(4000)) 
                end end end end tValue,
    t.newPortalPlanTechnologyId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join migration_itdr_technologies t on t.rp_technology_id = cv.resource_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where mcf.areaType = 3
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId in ('0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2')
union
-- add picklist values
    select 
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.resource_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    convert(cfc.name, char(4000)) tValue,
    t.newPortalPlanTechnologyId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join t_custom_field_choice cfc on cv.choice_id = cfc.id
    join migration_itdr_technologies t on t.rp_technology_id = cv.resource_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where resource_id is not null
    and mcf.areaType = 3
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875' /*PICKLIST*/) t);

select count(*) customFieldsCount from migration_technology_custom_fields_values;
