DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_custom_fields_vs_technology_type;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_custom_fields_vs_technology_type as
(

    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cf.id) row_num,
    UUID() newTechnologyTypeCustomFieldId,
    cf.id rp_custom_field_id,

    join migration_technology_type_data ttd on ttd.rp_technology_type_id = cf.resource_type_id
    where cf.areaType = 3
);

Update ITDR customFieldName to the pattern technologyName_customFieldName.
This is done because RP does not support sharing of the custom fields between technologies and may have the same name, but different options, for example.

text.value:
insert into bcOverrideSystemImpactCategories
(overrideSystemImpactCategoryId,
portalId,
impactCategoryId,
categoryName,
categoryColor,
categoryDescription,
dateTimeCreated,
createdById)
VALUES
(
    '@{item().overrideSystemImpactCategoryId}',
    '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}',
    (select impactCategoryId from bcImpactCategory where sequenceNbr = @{item().numericValue}),
    '@{item().name}',
    (select categoryColor from bcImpactCategory where sequenceNbr = @{item().numericValue}),
    '@{item().description}',
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
);

insert into bcImpactCategoryTranslation
(
    impactCategoryTranslationId,
    impactCategoryId,
    categoryName,
    categoryDescription,
    languageCode,
    overrideSystemImpactCategoryId,
    dateTimeCreated,
    createdById
)
values
(
    NEWID(),
    (select impactCategoryId from bcImpactCategory where sequenceNbr = @{item().numericValue}),
    '@{item().name}',
    '@{item().description}',
    'en',
    '@{item().overrideSystemImpactCategoryId}',
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
)

insert into bcExcludedSystemImpactCategories
(excludedSystemImpactCatogoryId,
portalId,
impactCategoryId,
dateTimeCreated,
createdById)
SELECT
NEWID(),
'@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}',
ic.impactCategoryId,
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
'@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
FROM 
bcImpactCategory ic
left join (
   SELECT impactCategoryId
   from bcOverrideSystemImpactCategories
   where portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}}') osic on osic.impactCategoryId = ic.impactCategoryId
where osic.impactCategoryId is null

source.query:
drop table if exists migration_user_location_fix;
create table migration_user_location_fix as
(
select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by rpUserId) row_num
, uuid() newUserLocationItemId
, rpUserId
, userName
, rpLocationId
, rpLocationName
, isPrimaryRelationship
, isManager
, preparisUserId
, ifnull(plm.preparisLocationId, defaultLocation.preparisLocationId) preparisLocationId
 from
(select 
ud.userId rpUserId,
replace(concat(ifnull(ud.userName, ''), ifnull(ud.firstName, ''), ifnull(ud.lastName, ''), ifnull(ud.employeeID, '')), '''', '') matcher,
sd.id rpLocationId,
sd.name rpLocationName,
usd.isPrimaryRelationship,
usd.isManager,
ud.userName
 from migration_user_data ud
left join migration_user_site_data usd on ud.newUserId = usd.newUserId
left join migration_site_data sd on usd.newSiteId = sd.newSiteId) rpUsersLocations
join migration_preparis_users_match pum on REPLACE(pum.matchString, '''', '') = rpUsersLocations.matcher
left join migration_preparis_locations_match plm on plm.matchString = rpUsersLocations.rpLocationName
join (select * from migration_preparis_locations_match where isDefault = 1 limit 1) defaultLocation on 1 = 1
);

Select count(*) userLocationsCount from migration_user_location_fix

dependsOn: [concat(variables('factoryId'), '/pipelines/Existing Preparis To RP User Matcher Opt')]

query.value:
SELECT 
case when fullName is NULL or fullName ='' 
    then REPLACE(TRIM(dbname), '''', '''''') 
    else REPLACE(TRIM(fullName), '''', '''''') end as CompanyName
FROM T_CLIENT_NAME
where dbname = '@{pipeline().globalParameters.rp_db_name}'
and datacenter = '@{pipeline().globalParameters.rp_datacenter}'

dependsOn.activity: Get Portal Id By DB Name

text.value:
update azstudioEntityEntities
set entityName = '@{activity('Company Name from RP DB').output.firstRow.CompanyName}'
where entityId = '@{activity('Get Portal Id By DB Name').output.pipelineReturnValue.currentPortalId}'


update e
set e.entityName = CONCAT('@{activity('Company Name from RP DB').output.firstRow.CompanyName}', ' - default location')
from azstudioEntityEntities e 
JOIN azstudioEntityHierarchy eh on eh.childEntityId = e.entityId
where entityName = REPLACE(CONCAT('@{activity('Company Name from RP DB').output.firstRow.CompanyName}', ' - default location'), '''', '')
and e.entityTypeId = '2067409a-be15-492c-8954-9d76e8d8a140'
and e.entityStatusTypeId = '4fdcaecc-b770-4202-a697-d52460223fe5'
and eh.parentEntityId = '@{activity('Get Portal Id By DB Name').output.pipelineReturnValue.currentPortalId}'

update azstudioEntitySettings
set settingValue = '@{activity('Company Name from RP DB').output.firstRow.CompanyName}'
where settingTypeId = '3754b3df-137c-4feb-a06f-240b5f3fb1c8' /*Portal Email From Name*/
and entityId = '@{activity('Get Portal Id By DB Name').output.pipelineReturnValue.currentPortalId}'

source.query:
SELECT 
    (SELECT uuid()) as newUserId
    , (SELECT uuid()) as entityUserItemId_portal
    , (SELECT uuid()) as entityUserItemId_location
    , IFNULL(c.name,'') as username
    , c.firstName
    , c.middleInitials
    , c.lastName
    , case u.role when 0 then 'SYSTEM' when 1 then 'PARTNER' when 2 THEN 'ADMIN' when 3 then 'MANAGER' when 4 then 'USER' when 5 then 'LISTED' end AS role
    , case u.status when 0 then 'ACTIVE' when 1 then 'INACTIVE' when 2 then 'LOCKED' when 3 then 'TERMINATED' end AS status
    , ct.name
    , ci.email
    , ci.primaryEmail
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line1, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line1
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line2, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line2
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.city, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) city
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.state, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) state
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.zip, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) zip
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.numberString, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) numberString
    , cic.name as contactInfoCountry
    , ct.NAME as contactTypeName
    , s.name as siteName
    , sc.name as siteCountryName
    , us.floor
    , us.room
    , us.seat
    , u.currentLoginAttempts
    , IFNULL(u.password,'') as password
    , u.passwordExpired
    , u.passwordLastUpdated
    , u.twoFactorAuth
    , u.twoFactorAuthSecret
    , u.creationdate
    , cast(s.latitude as float) as latitude
    , cast(s.longitude as float) as longitude
    , u.timezone
    , c.externalID
    , case u.timezone 
        when 'UTC' then '8fa8449a-4be5-4b8c-9bcd-c7f378a9f438'
        when 'JST' then '8702ab86-8acc-468d-a735-f5ab8c8de4d5'
        when 'CST' OR 'America/Chicago' then '19a4144b-76bd-42fd-baa8-bb528a814884'
        when 'EST' OR 'America/New_York' then 'c16ab931-6dfa-40b0-ac2a-e404e725c8b9'
        else concat('TimeZone', u.timezone, ' Not Yet Mapped')
        END  as timeZoneId
FROM T_CONTACT c
LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON c.id = u.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON c.id = ci.owner_id
JOIN T_CONTACT_TYPE ct ON ci.contact_type_id = ct.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_METHOD cm on ct.contact_method_id = cm.id
JOIN T_USER_SITE us ON u.id = us.user_id
JOIN T_SITE s on us.site_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY sc on s.country_id = sc.id 
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY cic on ci.country_id = cic.id

text.value:
INSERT INTO [dbo].[azstudioSecurityUsers]
           ([userId]
           ,[userName]
           ,[passwordHash]
           ,[userStateId]
           ,[dateTimeCreated]
           ,[createdById]
           ,[dateTimeLastModified]
           ,[lastModifiedById]
           ,[passwordResetRequired]
           ,[lat]
           ,[lng]
           ,[consecutiveFailedLoginAttempts]
           ,[dateTimePasswordLockout]
           ,[externalSystemId]
           ,[timeZoneId]
           ,[seed]
           ,[isFullyMigrated]
           ,[isSelfRegistered]
           ,[dateTimePasswordLastModified])
SELECT '@{item().newUserId}' as newUserId
, '@{item().username}' as username
, '@{item().password}' as password
, case when '@{item().role}' = 'LISTED' then '@{variables('userStateId_Active')}' else '@{variables('userStateId_Pending')}' end as userStateId
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimeCreated
, '@{variables('CreatedByGUID')}' as createdById
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimeLastModified
, '@{variables('CreatedByGUID')}' as lastModifiedById
, 1 as passwordResetRequired
, @{item().latitude} as lat
, @{item().longitude} as lng
, 0 as consecutiveFailedLoginAttempts
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimePasswordLockout
, '@{item().externalId}' as externalSystemId
, '@{item().timeZoneId}' as timeZoneId
, '' as seed
, 0 as isFullyMigrated
, 0 as isSelfRegistered
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as dateTimePasswordLastModified

SELECT 
    (SELECT uuid()) as newUserId
    , concat("'",IFNULL(c.name,''),"'") as username
    , c.firstName
    , c.middleInitials
    , c.lastName
    , case u.role when 0 then 'SYSTEM' when 1 then 'PARTNER' when 2 THEN 'ADMIN' when 3 then 'MANAGER' when 4 then 'USER' when 5 then 'LISTED' end AS role
    , case u.status when 0 then 'ACTIVE' when 1 then 'INACTIVE' when 2 then 'LOCKED' when 3 then 'TERMINATED' end AS status
    , ct.name
    , ci.email
    , ci.primaryEmail
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line1, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line1
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.line2, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) line2
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.city, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) city
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.state, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) state
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.zip, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) zip
    , cast(AES_DECRYPT(ci.numberString, x'37a95c7d900e8ebb39c9d1b36cf448a5') as char(255)) numberString
    , cic.name as contactInfoCountry
    , ct.NAME as contactTypeName
    , s.name as siteName
    , sc.name as siteCountryName
    , us.floor
    , us.room
    , us.seat
    , u.currentLoginAttempts
    , concat("'",IFNULL(u.password,''),"'") as password
    , u.passwordExpired
    , u.passwordLastUpdated
    , u.twoFactorAuth
    , u.twoFactorAuthSecret
    , u.creationdate
    , cast(s.latitude as float) as latitude
    , cast(s.longitude as float) as longitude
    , u.timezone
    , c.externalID
    , case u.timezone 
        when 'UTC' then '8fa8449a-4be5-4b8c-9bcd-c7f378a9f438'
        when 'JST' then '8702ab86-8acc-468d-a735-f5ab8c8de4d5'
        when 'CST' OR 'America/Chicago' then '19a4144b-76bd-42fd-baa8-bb528a814884'
        when 'EST' OR 'America/New_York' then 'c16ab931-6dfa-40b0-ac2a-e404e725c8b9'
        else concat('TimeZone', u.timezone, ' Not Yet Mapped')
        END  as timeZoneId
FROM T_CONTACT c
LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON c.id = u.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_INFO ci ON c.id = ci.owner_id
JOIN T_CONTACT_TYPE ct ON ci.contact_type_id = ct.id
JOIN T_CONTACT_METHOD cm on ct.contact_method_id = cm.id
JOIN T_USER_SITE us ON u.id = us.user_id
JOIN T_SITE s on us.site_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY sc on s.country_id = sc.id 
LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY cic on ci.country_id = cic.id
